event.name: FISHING_STORE_INO2
event.text:
You've entered the station's oxygen generator room.
There appears to note scratched into the generator. "Kill them all, and come find me."
You quickly destroy the oxygen generator, it's unlikely you'll be seeing this station again, at least in this universe.

event.name: FISHING_STORE_KILLED
event.text:
The station has been emptied of crew.
You receive an empty message There's a set of coordinates attached...

event.name: FISHING_MAW_QUEST
event.text:
You arrive at the beacon face to face with a strange looking autoship.
"Ahh, A renegade, very well. Prove your competency in battle and I will join with you."
"Very well challenger, prepare to meet your doom..."
You refuse the offer from the strange autoship and move away to wait for your FTL drive to charge.

event.name: DESTROYED_FISH_MAW_ENEMY
event.text:
As the autoship is breaking apart you can see certain parts of the ship moving together to form an object.
You move in and find a strange looking weapon resting in the middle of the wreck, it appears the autoship has formed itself into a weapon for your use.

event.name: STORAGE_CHECK_FISH_MAW
event.text: What do you want to do?

event.name: STORAGE_CHECK_FISH_MAW_CONSUME
event.text:
What do you want to feed to The Maw?
Upgrade Points: MAW

event.name: FISH_MAW_CONSUME_FOOD_1
event.text: You feed the basic fish to The Maw, it greedily consumes the fish, bones and all.
